entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Armstrong
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:02 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -11.0°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow and local blowing snow. Amount 10 to 15 cm. Wind north 40 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 15.
entry.summary: Snow ending late in the afternoon then mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Local blowing snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 15. Wind chill near minus 27. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 28. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries early in the evening. Otherwise clear. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light early in the evening. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 in the evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 12:28 AM EST Wednesday 15 February 2023
